body:
So Avicus has a nice update and everything is looking good besides a glitch in one of the maps where you fall on a certain place and you get stuck in the air.

Not even 24 hours yet and we already have people saying that "OMG AVICUZ IZ COPYIN OCN!!!111!!!!"

Shut up. Please.

You guys act as if OCN is the original creator of every gamemode. 

We have CTW, many people wanted it. So do I. Now that we have it, you guys complain? Shut up. Seriously, enough this is bullcrap. The devs, mods, and map devs are trying their hardest to make this a great server and we got people who are saying that Avicus is copying OCN.

I mean like, with SG now we got people who are saying Avicus is copying other servers now. Seriously, this is a game... about blocks...

Other servers have copied other servers. TDM has always been here, CTW was a gamemode back in MCZone, SG is basically a different version of Hunger Games.

Every server has copied something or someone whether inside minecraft or outside minecraft. Seriously, stop.  

You guys are like friggin' toddlers fighting over a glass of water...
body_tagged:

We have CTW, many people wanted it. So do I. Now that we have it, you guys complain? Shut up. Seriously, enough this is bullcrap. The devs, mods, and map devs are trying their hardest to make this a great server and we got people who are saying that Avicus is copying OCN.

I mean like, with SG now we got people who are saying Avicus is copying other servers now. Seriously, this is a game... about blocks...

Other servers have copied other servers. TDM has always been here, CTW was a gamemode back in MCZone, SG is basically a different version of Hunger Games.

Every server has copied something or someone whether inside minecraft or outside minecraft. Seriously, stop.  

You guys are like friggin' toddlers fighting over a glass of water...

replies.body:
<sarcasm>

I would like to assure all of you that AVN bases all of its updates directly on OCN code.  We literally have stolen the entire OCN codebase and we copy and paste each line by hand into the Avicus code.  Every gamemode that you see actually originated in the brains of members of the OCN staff.  Because obviously the goal here is to completely copy OCN.

</sarcasm>
